alert.note: Alert for Brookings (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued September 23 at 3:12PM MDT until September 23 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Tornado Warning for... North central Brookings County in east central South Dakota... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 412 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Bruce, or 7 miles southeast of Estelline, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Weather spotters reported funnel cloud northeast of Bruce, South Dakota. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Brookings County. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Sioux Falls.
